column1: It's too early to tell what impact, if any, travel restrictions being imposed by multiple countries in response to the novel #COVID19 outbreak will have on my business travel agenda but I suppose to be flying to LIS, HEL, OPO, LHR, BOO, TRS and may be BRU in the next weeks, hmm
